titles.title: A resolution congratulating the High Point Furniture Market on the occasion of its 100th anniversary as a leader in home furnishing.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
9/16/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the High Point Furniture Market on its 100th anniversary as a leader in home furnishing.
Honors the Market's contributions during the last 100 years.
Encourages the Market to continue as the worldwide premier event of the home furnishings industry.
